QuestData.Title: While You're At It
QuestData.Description: Fine by me if King Greymane wants you to risk your life to rescue a known traitor.$B$BDo me a favor and do something useful while you're out there and kill these cursed fleabags.
QuestData.RewardText: If I hadn't seen you kill a few of the mangy things with my own eyes, I'd think you did not complete the task I asked of you.$B$BIt looks like we're hardly putting a dent in their numbers.
